DELETE FROM ProjectMilestones WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' AND actual_completion_date IS NULL;

DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE project_id NOT IN (SELECT project_id FROM milestones);
DELETE FROM Milestone WHERE project_id = 1 AND completed = true;
DELETE FROM Task WHERE project_id = (SELECT project_id FROM Project WHERE project_name = 'Example Project');
DELETE FROM milestones WHERE due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
